game.name: My Favorite Store Simulator
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Start with a small shop and work your way up to a huge supermarket! Manage prices, serve customers, catch thieves, hire staff, and much more. Play solo or in co-op with up to 4 players.
